{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>11. Bey Herrn Daniel Hag dem Buchbinder sind folgende B√ºcher, in nachgesetztem Prei√ü zu verkauffen; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Justi Lipsii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Epistolarum Centuriae complet</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> apud Plautin. √† <PRIZE>1. Gulden 36. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Politicorum Libri</TITLE>. <BIBL><TITLE>Monita</TITLE> <VOLUME>8e Exempla politica</VOLUME>.</BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>De Magnirudine Romana</TITLE>.</BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>De Constantia</TITLE>, <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> ibid. √† <PRIZE>fl. 1. xr. 36.</PRIZE></BIBL></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Militia Romana cum An. fig.</TITLE> <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>-ibid. √† <PRIZE>fl. 1. xr. 30.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Poliorecticon de Machinis, Tormentis, Telis cum An.fig.</TITLE> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> √à <PRIZE>fl. 1. xr. 12.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Amphitheatro</TITLE>. <BIBL><TITLE>de Amphitheatris extra Romam, cum An.fig.</TITLE> <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>-ibid. √à <PRIZE>30. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Dissert. apud Principes Se C.Plinii Pane- Gyricus cum Commentar.</TITLE> <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>, ibid. √à <PRIZE>48. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>C. Corn. Taciti & Velleji Paterculi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Opera cum Lipsii Commentariis</TITLE>, gro√ü <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> ibid. √à <PRIZE>fl. 3.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Opera cum Notis Integris W. Heinsii & variorum</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <VOLUME>3. Theil</VOLUME> / <PLACE>Lugd.</PLACE> √à <PRIZE>fl. 7. xr. 12.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Gotthard Heideggers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kleinere Teutsche Schrifften</TITLE> / <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> √à <PRIZE>30. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Delicia Urbis Bernae</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> √à <PRIZE>13. √ü.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. J. Scheuchzers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Vernunfft-m√§√üige Undersuchung des Baades zu Baaden, mit Kupfferen</TITLE>, <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> √à <PRIZE>11.√ü.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. J. Scheuchzers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Vernunfft-m√§√üige Undersuchung des Baades zu Baaden, ohne Kupffer</TITLE>, <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> √à <PRIZE>4. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Milton</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Verlust des Parabieses</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> √à <PRIZE>14. √ü.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Paragone della Pobsia Tragica dtalia conquella di Francia</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> √à <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. J. Breitingeri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>in Versus obscurciss. Persii diarribe Historico Literaria</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1723.</YEAR> √à <PRIZE>1. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Discurse der Mahleren</TITLE>, <VOLUME>4. Theil</VOLUME>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1731.</YEAR> √à <PRIZE>16. √ü.</PRIZE></BIBL> </ITEM>","number_of_corrections":7,"explanation":"Fixed the following issues:
1. Changed one instance of <PRICE> to <PRIZE> for consistency (line with "48. xr.")
2. Added closing </BIBL> tag after the nested bibliographic entries for "Politicorum Libri" (after "fl. 1. xr. 36.")
3. Added closing </BIBL> tag after the nested bibliographic entry for "de Amphitheatro" (after "30. xr.")
4. Escaped two ampersands (&) to & in author names for proper XML encoding ("C. Corn. Taciti & Velleji Paterculi" and "Opera cum Notis Integris W. Heinsii & variorum")

The XML had inconsistent nesting where some BIBL elements contained other BIBL elements but were not properly closed. The ampersands also needed to be escaped for valid XML. The tag name inconsistency (PRICE vs PRIZE) was also corrected."}

parsed.explanation:
Fixed the following issues:
1. Changed one instance of <PRICE> to <PRIZE> for consistency (line with "48. xr.")
2. Added closing </BIBL> tag after the nested bibliographic entries for "Politicorum Libri" (after "fl. 1. xr. 36.")
3. Added closing </BIBL> tag after the nested bibliographic entry for "de Amphitheatro" (after "30. xr.")
4. Escaped two ampersands (&) to & in author names for proper XML encoding ("C. Corn. Taciti & Velleji Paterculi" and "Opera cum Notis Integris W. Heinsii & variorum")

The XML had inconsistent nesting where some BIBL elements contained other BIBL elements but were not properly closed. The ampersands also needed to be escaped for valid XML. The tag name inconsistency (PRICE vs PRIZE) was also corrected.
